name: ChickChick (Daivy)
description:
A small online multiplayer game made for Ludum Dare 51 under 72h.

——— Description ———

This is an online multiplayer game where you play as a small chick.

In here, your goal is to complete task in every level.

Get your friends or join other people to complete level together!

This game contain secret mechanics. Every level can be 100% complete by just one player.

——— Control ———

⦿W/A/S/D - move

⦿SPACE - jump

⦿Click the sign to show the level goal/hints (You may find secrets!)

⦿Click the back button on the top left to go back to the previous level

——— WARNING ———

This game is using server-client connection.

There will be some control delay if you are far away the server location(NA East).

If you can’t connect to the server, there might be a server issue.

You can inform me the issue by commenting below, or on the itch.io page.

And hopefully you can come back to play it once the issue is fixed! :)
